text: PCR primers and probes were designed based on the sequences reported in GenBank with the Primer Express software version 1.2 ( Applied Biosystems ) as follows : <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> forward primer , 5'-GAAACAGCACATTCCCAGAGTTC-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reverse primer , 5'-ATGGCCCAGCGGATGAG-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> EF-1a <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> forward primer , 5'-CTGAACCATCCAGGCCAAAT-3 ' ; and <extra_id_0> EF-1a <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reverse primer , 5'-GCCGTGTGGCAATCCAAT-3 ' , as previously described ( Mantel et al . , 2007 ) .

<extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> forward primer , 5'-GCGGGCTCTATCACAAAATGA-3 ' ; and <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reverse primer 5'-GCTCTCCTGGCTGCAGACAGC-3 ' ( Mantel et al . , 2007 ) .

<extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> forward primer , 5'-GATGCGCCAGGAAGTTTCAT-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reverse primer , 5'-GCACAATCATCTGGGTCACATT-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> RORC2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> forward primer , 5'-CAGTCATGAGAACACAAATTGAAGTG-3 ' ; and <extra_id_0> RORC2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reverse primer 5'-CAGGTGATAACCCCGTAGTGGAT-3 ' .

The prepared cDNAs were amplified using SYBR green PCR master mix ( Fermentas ) according to the recommendations of the manufacturer in an ABI PRISM 7000 Sequence Detection System ( Applied Biosystems ) .

<extra_id_0> RUNX1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA was detected by using TaqMan Gene Expression Assays from Applied Biosystems and used according to the manufacturer 's instruction using TaqMan master mix using a 7000 real-time PCR system ( Applied Biosystems ) .

text: PCR amplification of the housekeeping gene encoding <extra_id_0> elongation factor (EF)-1alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or by using the <extra_id_0> 18S rRNA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Gene Expression Assay ( Applied Biosystems ) was performed to allow normalization between samples .
Relative quantification and calculation of the range of confidence was performed using the comparative deltadeltaCT method ( Applied Biosystems ) .

The percentage of <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA in siRNA - mediated <extra_id_0> RUNX <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> knockdown cells was calculated in relation to cells , which were transfected with scrambled control siRNA .
